<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal">    InitialMismatch = 2,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// InitialMatch stays matched after fuzzy profile matching.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal">    UnchangedMatch = 3,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// InitialMismatch stays mismatched after fuzzy profile matching.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal">    UnchangedMismatch = 4,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// InitialMismatch is recovered after fuzzy profile matching.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal">    RecoveredMismatch = 5,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// InitialMatch is removed and becomes mismatched after fuzzy profile</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// matching.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal">    RemovedMatch = 6,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> State == MatchState::InitialMismatch ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">           State == MatchState::UnchangedMismatch ||</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Determine if the function matches profile. If FindMatchedProfileOnly is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// set, only search the existing matched function. Otherwise, try matching the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// two functions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> functionMatchesProfile(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FunctionId &amp;IRFuncName,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FunctionId &amp;ProfileFuncName,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FindMatchedProfileOnly);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Determine if the function matches profile by computing a similarity ratio</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// between two sequences of callsite anchors extracted from function and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// profile. If it&#39;s above the threshold, the function matches the profile.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> functionMatchesProfile(Function &amp;IRFunc, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FunctionId &amp;ProfFunc,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find functions that don&#39;t show in the profile or profile symbol list,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which are supposed to be new functions. We use them as the targets for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// call graph matching.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
